text: Palmira Brummett is an American historian of Middle Eastern history, currently a Distinguished Humanities Professor and formerly a Lindsay Young Professor, at the University of Tennessee. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Tennessee faculty Category:21st-century American historians Category:University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign alumni Category:University of Chicago alumni
title: Palmira Brummett
